content.text: It's been busy, but good overall. My wedding planning business is taking off and I'm really excited about it.
That's great! I've always been fascinated by wedding planning. Do you have a favorite part of the process?
I love helping couples create the perfect day for them. It's so rewarding to see their joy on their wedding day.
That sounds like a really rewarding job. I'm glad you're enjoying it.
What kind of wedding do you like to plan? Do you have a favorite style?
I love all kinds of weddings, but I do have a soft spot for outdoor weddings. There's something so romantic about getting married in the great outdoors.
That does sound romantic. I can definitely see the appeal.
It's especially nice if you can get married at a beautiful location, like a beach or a park.
That would be amazing. I'd love to get married on the beach someday.
It's definitely on my bucket list.
